Articles.Content: I think everybody but the absolute beginners will know how laggy ships can get, especially when they have lots of high mass parts which can bog your computer down. When massive ships are involved, it can get real bad with the docked ships wobbling around and flexing which just adds extra stress to your computer. After the wobble it just breaks into "Moar struts!" But that can lag even worse. Anyways, to the main point. What if we welded certain high mass modules that are docked together, like the welding mod allows you to do? This wouldn't help for the massive in one launch ships, but if you aren't Whackjob you most likely wouldn't do that. Anyways, you can discuss about how you think it could/should be applied. Or if you disagree massively.
It's a good idea. I would like the ability (Even if it's a mod) to do this in orbit. i.e send up Part A, dock Part B with Part A, weld A to B to create a stronger connection and avoid all the wobble.
